title: Prize Bond Result Matching System
subtitle: Easily manage your prize bonds and check if you've won! Add your bonds individually or in bulk, and match them against the latest draw results.
step_1_desc: Enter your prize bond numbers individually or upload them in bulk using our easy-to-use interface.
step_2_desc: Select a draw from our comprehensive list and instantly check if any of your bonds have won.
step_3_desc: Keep track of all your prize bonds and get notified when new draw results are available.
add_bonds_desc: Add your prize bonds individually or upload them in bulk.
check_results_desc: Check your bonds against the latest draw results.
view_manage_account: View and manage your account details
results_description: Check if your prize bonds have won in any of our draws. Select a draw number below to see if fortune smiles upon you today!
choose_draw: Choose a draw number to check your results.
congrats: Congratulations! The following bonds have won prizes
no_win: No winning bonds found in this draw. Better luck next time!
login_prompt: Login to your prize bond account
signup_prompt: Sign up for your prize bond account
official_results_desc: Check the official prize bond results from the Govt Site of Bangladesh.
no_history: You have no winning bond history yet
no_history_hint: When you win a prize, your winning bonds will appear here.
